• Loupe Transparency

    The transparency of the loupe can now be adjusted from 10% to 100%.

  • Shot Preview

    A preview image has been added to the information courts.

  • Recent Shots

    In the 'Screenshot' menu there is now a list of recent shots. Clicking on a recent shot will opened the shot in a browser.

  • Arrow Keys

    The code for the arrow keys has been completely redone and no longer requires the 'window' menu. This rewrite also fixed a bug that cause the arrow keys to move the loupe when a text field was active instead of moving the cursor. The arrow keys have the same behavior as before, they move the loupe 1px, 10px if the âŒ˜ key is down.

  • Cancel Button

    Now that there is a shot preview in the information court it makes sense to have a cancel button so you can take the shot again if you don't like the preview.

  • Disable Buttons

    This is a minor item but the upload buttons and menu items are now disabled while a shot is being uploaded.
